label: ABC4D_hP14_173_a_b_bc_b-001
title: LiKSO$_{4}$ ($H1_{4}$) Structure
comments:
As there is no center of symmetry in the structure, the point $z = 0$ can be set arbitrarily.  Following (Bhakay-Tamhane, 1984) we set $z_{1} = 0$. 
 While {\em Struckturbericht} symbols $H1_{1}$, $H1_{2}$ and $H1_{5}$ are identical with $S1_{1}$, $S1_{2}$ and $S1_{5}$, respectively, there is no connection between this structure and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3C12D3_cI160_230_a_c_h_d-001}{$S1_{4}$, garnet (A2B3C12D3\_cI160\_230\_a\_c\_h\_d)}.
